item.title: 早间竞价日本央行拯救世界
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu.】

item.title: 国泰航空将购买 30 架空中客车 A330-900 型飞机
item.description: 总部设在香港的国泰航空公司周三表示，将以约110亿美元的基本价格购买30架空客A330-900宽体飞机，并可选择再购买30架。【原文：Cathay Pacific will buy 30 Airbus A330-900 wide-body aircraft for a basic price of about $11 billion, with options to buy another 30, the Hong Kong-based airline said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，罗氏考虑剥离价值 19 亿美元的癌症数据初创公司
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，瑞士制药公司罗氏正在考虑剥离癌症数据专家 Flatiron Health。【原文：Swiss pharmaceutical company Roche is considering divesting cancer data specialist Flatiron Health, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新加坡星展银行第二季度净利润增长 4%，超出预期
item.description: 新加坡最大的银行星展集团周三公布，第二季度净利润同比增长4%，主要得益于总收入的增长，其中手续费收入创下历史新高。【原文：Singapore's biggest bank, DBS Group , posted on Wednesday a rise of 4% in second-quarter net profit from a year earlier, boosted by stronger total income, with fee income at a record high.】

item.title: 香港国泰航空宣布派发中期股息，利润下降 15
item.description: 国泰航空公司（Cathay Pacific Airways）周三宣布派发中期股息，称其上半年利润同比下降 15%，但业绩表现强劲。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways on Wednesday declared an interim dividend citing a strong performance even as its first half profit dropped 15% from a year ago.】

item.title: 中国 7 月出口增速降至 3 个月低点，但进口稳健增长
item.description: 周三的海关数据显示，中国 7 月份出口同比增长 7.0%，增速低于 6 月份，为 4 月份以来最弱，但进口强劲增长 7.2%。【原文：China's exports climbed 7.0% in July from year earlier, a slower pace of growth than in June and the weakest since April, but imports rose at robust 7.2% rate, customs data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 泰国批准现代汽车 2,800 万美元的电动汽车投资
item.description: 泰国投资委员会周三表示，泰国已批准韩国现代汽车公司价值 10 亿泰铢（2800 万美元）的投资。【原文：Thailand has approved an investment worth 1 billion baht ($28 million) from South Korean auto maker Hyundai, the Board of Investment said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：中国恒大清算人对普华永道提起诉讼
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，陷入困境的地产巨头中国恒大集团的清算人已开始对普华永道会计师事务所提起法律诉讼，指控其在为该集团工作时存在 "疏忽 "和 "失实陈述"。【原文：Liquidators of troubled property giant China Evergrande Group have started legal action against PricewaterhouseCoopers, accusing it of "negligence" and "misrepresentation" in its work for the group, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴拿马政府为高达 90 亿美元的融资敞开大门
item.description: 巴拿马部长理事会在一份声明中说，巴拿马政府周二通过了两项法令，允许经济部寻求累计 90 亿美元的融资。【原文：Panama's government passed two decrees on Tuesday allowing the economy ministry to seek a cumulative $9 billion in financing, Panama's council of ministers said in a statement.】

item.title: 日本央行副行长称市场不稳定时不会加息
item.description: 日本央行（BOJ）副行长内田伸一周三表示，央行不会在金融市场不稳定时提高利率。【原文：Bank of Japan (BOJ) Deputy Governor Shinichi Uchida said on Wednesday the central bank won't raise interest rates when financial markets are unstable.】

item.title: 交易员考虑降息押注和利差因素，美元持稳，日元震荡
item.description: 周三，美元持稳，拖累日元脱离七个月高位，货币市场在本周恢复了平静。本周伊始，受经济衰退担忧和热门套息交易平仓的影响，资产出现大幅震荡。【原文：The dollar was steady on Wednesday, dragging the yen away from a seven-month peak as currency markets regained a semblance of calm in a week that began with a massive shakeout in assets driven by recession fears and unwinding of popular carry trades.】

item.title: 亚洲股市稍稍站稳脚跟，日经指数仍波澜不惊
item.description: 在华尔街反弹以及对美国经济衰退的担忧被重新评估之后，周三亚洲股市大多走强，但由于波动加剧挤压了杠杆头寸，日本股市出现下跌。【原文：Asian share markets were mostly firmer on Wednesday after Wall Street bounced and concerns about a U.S. recession were reassessed, though Japanese stocks took a dip as heightened volatility squeezed leveraged positions.】

item.title: 美国原油和汽油库存意外增加，油价走低
item.description: 行业数据显示美国原油和汽油库存意外增加，抵消了全球石油供应担忧，油价在上一交易日短暂反弹后，周三亚洲早盘下滑。【原文：Oil prices slipped in early Asian trading on Wednesday following a brief rebound in the previous session after industry data showed an unexpected build in U.S. crude oil and gasoline inventories, offsetting global oil supply concerns.】

item.title: 日本 4 月份日元购买干预创下新的日记录
item.description: 日本周三表示，日本在 4 月份进行了创纪录的单日日元买入干预，卖出了价值 5.92 万亿日元（408.3 亿美元）的美元，以应对当时日元的下跌。【原文：Japan said on Wednesday that it conducted a record single-day yen-buying intervention in April, selling 5.92 trillion yen ($40.83 billion) worth of dollars in a fight against a falling yen at that time.】

item.title: 日本首相候选人石破赞同日本央行加息
item.description: 日本下一任首相的主要潜在候选人支持日本央行逐步提高利率的政策，称其货币政策正常化可推动价格下降并提高工业竞争力。【原文：A prime potential candidate for Japan's next prime minister endorsed the Bank of Japan's policy of gradually raising interest rates, saying its normalisation of monetary policy could push down prices and boost industrial competitiveness.】

item.title: 贝莱德和纳斯达克寻求修改规则，以上市以太坊 ETF 现货期权
item.description: 据周二提交的一份监管文件显示，贝莱德和交易所运营商纳斯达克已提议修改规则，以上市交易该资产管理公司的现货以太坊交易所交易基金期权。【原文：BlackRock and exchange operator Nasdaq have proposed a rule change to list and trade options for the asset manager's spot ethereum exchange-traded fund, according to a regulatory filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称三星 8 层 HBM3E 芯片通过 Nvidia 测试可投入使用
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，三星电子第五代高带宽内存（HBM）芯片（或称 HBM3E）的一个版本已通过 Nvidia 的测试，可用于其人工智能（AI）处理器。【原文：A version of Samsung Electronics' fifth-generation high bandwidth memory (HBM) chips, or HBM3E, has passed Nvidia's tests for use in its artificial intelligence (AI) processors, three sources briefed on the results said.】

item.title: 受生物技术资金紧缩影响，Illumina 预计核心业务全年销售额将下降
item.description: 基因测序仪制造商Illumina公司周二预测，2024年其核心业务部门的销售额将出现下滑，这表明对基因测试所用仪器的低迷需求可能会延续到今年。【原文：Gene sequencing machine maker Illumina on Tuesday forecast 2024 sales from its core segment to decline, a sign that subdued demand for its instruments used in genetic tests could extend further into the year.】

item.title: 桥水称日本股市抛售过度
item.description: 据熟悉这封信的两位消息人士称，桥水联合公司在周二发给投资者的一份评论中表示，该公司认为前一天日本股市的抛售被夸大了，这些股票仍然具有一定的吸引力。【原文：Bridgewater Associates said in a commentary sent to investors on Tuesday that it believes the sell-off in Japan's equities the previous day was exaggerated and that the stocks remain somewhat attractive, according to two sources familiar with the letter.】

item.title: 永利因澳门赌场提振而实现季度利润增长
item.description: 永利度假村周二公布第二季度利润增长，原因是大流行后前往赌场中心旅游的人数反弹，帮助其澳门物业吸引了源源不断的游客。【原文：Wynn Resorts posted a rise in second-quarter profit on Tuesday, as a post-pandemic rebound in travel to casino hubs helped attract a steady stream of visitors to its Macau properties.】

item.title: 早间竞标："转机星期二 "暂时舒缓神经
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 肾透析服务需求强劲，DaVita 上调年度利润预期
item.description: 医疗保健公司达维塔（DaVita）周二上调了 2024 年的利润预期，预计其肾脏透析服务需求强劲，公司股价在盘后交易中上涨了 3%。【原文：Healthcare company DaVita raised its 2024 profit forecast on Tuesday expecting strong demand for its kidney dialysis services, sending shares of the company up 3% in aftermarket trade.】

item.title: 因中国需求改善，Vans 母公司 VF Corp 第一季度收入降幅小于预期
item.description: VF 公司周二公布的第一季度收入降幅小于预期，得益于中国业务的改善和库存水平的降低，该公司股价在盘后交易中上涨了 5%。【原文：VF Corp reported a smaller-than-expected drop in first-quarter revenue on Tuesday, helped by improvement in its China business as well as leaner inventory levels, sending its shares up 5% in extended trading.】

item.title: 巴西贷款机构伊塔乌尼班科银行第二季度利润增长 15
item.description: 巴西伊塔乌国民银行（Itau Unibanco）是拉丁美洲总资产最大的私人贷款公司，该公司周二公布的第二季度经常性净利润同比增长 15.2%。【原文：Brazil's Itau Unibanco , Latin America's largest private lender by total assets, on Tuesday posted a 15.2% increase in its second-quarter net recurring profit compared to a year earlier.】

item.title: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司签署 10 亿美元信贷额度协议
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周二表示，该公司签署了一项为期五年、价值 10 亿美元的银团信贷协议。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer signed a five-year $1 billion syndicated credit agreement, the firm said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 电脑配件制造商罗技任命 Matteo Anversa 为首席财务官
item.description: 电脑配件制造商罗技国际公司周二表示，已任命 Matteo Anversa 为公司首席财务官，9 月 1 日起生效。【原文：Computer accessories maker Logitech International said on Tuesday it has appointed Matteo Anversa as its chief financial officer, effective Sept. 1.】

item.title: 数字广告支出增长，Reddit 预计季度营收高于预期
item.description: Reddit 周二预计第三季度营收将高于华尔街预期，这表明数字广告市场的复苏将为该社交媒体平台吸引新的广告客户。【原文：Reddit forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, a sign that a recovering digital ad market would draw new advertisers to the social media platform.】

item.title: Rivian 坚持产量预期，第二季度利润率低于预期
item.description: Rivian Automotive 周二维持了今年的产量预期，并表示由于成本削减尚未生效，每交付一辆电动汽车的亏损比分析师预期的要多。【原文：Rivian Automotive maintained its production forecast for the year on Tuesday and said it lost more per electric car delivered than analysts had expected as cost-cuts are yet to take effect.】

item.title: 经济忧虑导致需求放缓，Airbnb 预计第三季度收入黯淡
item.description: 度假租赁公司 Airbnb 周二预计第三季度营收低于华尔街预期，并公布第二季度利润下降，原因是美国客户的需求减弱。【原文：Vacation rental company Airbnb forecast third-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday and reported a lower second-quarter profit, as it flagged weakening demand from U.S. customers.】

item.title: 高盛新指数显示金融压力相对正常
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周二表示，该公司已推出新的金融压力指数（FSI），虽然在过去两天的市场动荡中该指数有所收紧，但从历史标准来看仍处于相对正常的水平。【原文：Goldman Sachs on Tuesday said it has introduced a new Financial Stress Index (FSI) that, while tightening over the last two days of market ructions, remains at relatively normal levels by historical standards.】
